---
title: "Grilled Shrimp With Chile and Garlic"
categories: Fish
---

# Ingredients
 - 6 garlic cloves
 - Fresh jalapeno (or other hot chile)
 - 1/4 cup mayo
 - 1.5 tsps salt
 - 1/4 tsp baking soda
 - 680g large shrimp

# Instructions
## 1
 - Peel shrimp, leave tails on, pat dry
 - Prepare grill on high heat
 - Microplane garlic and chile into a medium bowl
 - Stir mayo into the bowl w/ salt and baking soda
 - Add shrimp
 - Refrigerate for 15-30 minutes

## 2
 - Clean grill (no need to grease)
 - Grill shrimp (2-4 minutes)
 - Flip and cook until opaque throughout (1-2 minutes)
